doc.title: Zirvedekiler
doc.plot: This is the story of the struggles given for reaching and staying always at the top, at every expense. The story of Zeynep the movie star, whose beauty and fame reached the peak. She then marries a rich, powerful and good-looking businessman called Sahin. Sahin is ready to spend all his fortune for her, and loves her passionately. He is so brave, even to risk his life...Though, had Sahin who loves the young woman deeply, a different personality than Zeynep knows?... What was the mystery that differentiated him at home from his business world?...On the one side a caring and compassionate husband, an ideal spouse, whereas on the other side a man getting mixed up in affairs resulting in murder. A cruel, frightening man full of mystery. Adventitous events happening within the family and firm which reach their climax. Being at the top or not, creates a crucial point for Sahin and Zeynep's mutual future. Just as it is the case with life and death.
